content: For release on delivery    9:00 p.m. EDT (8 p.m. local time)   October 14, 2013           Celebrating 20 Years of the Bank of Mexico’s Independence     Remarks by    Ben S. Bernanke    Chairman    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    at    “Central Bank Independence--Progress and Challenges,” a Conference Sponsored by the   Bank of Mexico    Mexico City, Mexico          October 14, 2013   (via prerecorded video)
